review: This is one of the best twin-stick shooters I've ever played, and if you love that style of game, then absolutely go pick this up. If you're still making your mind up, I even made a handy Youtube video for you to see the game in action:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Ap6WnXDbdw
